description: This Python source file defines the PkgManifest class, which extends the Manifest class to manage package manifests within a software build system. It includes methods to create initial and final manifests, with the initial creation writing data to a file based on internal variables.

classes.name: PkgManifest
classes.description: A class extending the Manifest class, responsible for handling package manifest creation, particularly initializing manifest files with package data.

methods.name: create_initial(self)
methods.description: Creates the initial package manifest file by writing header information and a list of packages based on internal variables.

methods.description: Placeholder for creating the final manifest, currently not implemented.

methods.description: Placeholder for creating a complete manifest based on provided parameters, currently not implemented.
